channel.title: [PI]Objects only on certain height?[PI]
channel.description: How do I make these objects: [code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4874, 2752, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 2753, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4876, 2754, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4877, 2755, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4878, 2756, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz[/code] Only on height 1? It shows up on height 0 atm... I'll rep+.

item.title: [PI]Objects only on certain height?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I’m trying to make those objects only appear at height 1, not height 0.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Objects only on certain height?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

What exactly are you trying to do? When I change my character’s height to 1, objects move up with me.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Objects only on certain height?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“adamknightz, post:2, topic:381691”] if (c.heightLevel == 1) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4874, 2752, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 2753, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4876, 2754, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4877, 2755, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4878, 2756, 3501, 0, 10); //stallz

Try that.[/quote]
Still on height 0

Read full topic
